abstract: Oracle sounded a warning bell that growth was likely to slow in the first quarter as the company absorbed its latest major acquisition, BEA Systems.
snippet: Oracle sounded a warning bell that growth was likely to slow in the first quarter as the company absorbed its latest major acquisition, BEA Systems.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Oracle sounded a warning bell that growth was likely to slow in the first quarter as the company absorbed its latest major acquisition, BEA Systems.

headline.main: Strong Sales of Software Lift Oracle’s Net Income
headline.print_headline: Strong Sales Of Software Lift Oracle’s Net Income
